channel.title: Erm.. A Code Snippet Would Be Nice :P
channel.description:
Well, I am making an Auto Talker for my friend for a game called Tibia, and I wanted to use the Robot class for some reason, anyway, I looked in the docs, google, everywhere.
Mainly, what I I want is; something that handles the taskbar that searches for something called "Tibia" Then just clicks on it, which would open it up. Then use the robot class to type the specified sentence.
Oh, and if you're wondering why I've used NetBeans for it, is because I wanted to use it for something haha, and couldn't be bothered to write up the whole GUI :P
[url=http://www.hotlinkfiles.com/files/375424_lpwgp/TibAutoTalker.zip]TibAutoTalker.zip[/url]

item.title: Erm.. A Code Snippet Would Be Nice :P

@Yz85Racer wrote:

Ohk, I’ll try it, thanks remove_later.
